body.p: An entity shall recognise the expected cost of short‑term employee benefits in the form of paid absences under paragraph 11 as follows:

li.p: in the case of accumulating paid absences, when the employees render service that increases their entitlement to future paid absences.
in the case of non‑accumulating paid absences, when the absences occur.
